Package database

Class ContactQuery

java.lang.Object
database.ContactQuery
public class ContactQuery extends Object
This class provides methods for querying and retrieving contact data from a database. It uses prepared statements to ensure secure and efficient database access.
Author:
Daniel Akoko

  • Constructor Details

    • ContactQuery

      public ContactQuery()

  • Method Details

    • getAllContacts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Contact> getAllContacts()
      Retrieves all contacts from the "contacts" table. Uses a prepared statement with a SELECT query to fetch data. Creates Contact objects based on the retrieved data and adds them to an ObservableList. Catches and throws any SQL exceptions.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of Contact objects containing details like contact ID, contact name, and email.

    • returnContactList

      public static Contact returnContactList(int contactID)
      Retrieves a specific contact based on their ID. Uses a prepared statement with a SELECT query that filters by the contact ID. Creates a single Contact object from the result set. Catches and throws any SQL exceptions.
      Parameters:
      contactID - The ID of the contact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Contact object containing details like contact ID, contact name, and email.

    • returnContactId

      public static int returnContactId(String contactName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the ID of a contact based on their name. Uses a prepared statement with a SELECT query that filters by the contact name. Expects only one matching contact and returns its ID as an integer. Catches and throws any SQL exceptions.
      Parameters:
      contactName - The name of the contact.
      Returns:
      The contact ID associated with the provided contact name.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or if multiple contacts with the same name are found.
